title: Freedmans Bureau Order and lost family ad-context

content.question: Which of the following best describes the context in which these sources were created?

choices.label: The period when formerly enslaved people were attempting to adjust to life as American citizens
Following the passage of the Fifteenth Amendment, which granted voting rights to African American men
Following Lincoln’s issuing of the Emancipation Proclamation during the Civil War
The era known as the "nadir,” when racial relations in the United States were at their lowest

content.answer: The period when formerly enslaved people were attempting to adjust to life as American citizens
